headline: T Expands Enterprise Network Security Offerings: Will it Drive Growth?

headline: Data Center Interconnect Market Report 2025-2030, with Case Studies of Cisco, Megaport, Extreme Networks, Huawei Technologies, CyberAgent, Ciena, Nokia, Espanix, Rackspace, Infinera, and JPIX
summary: Growth in the global data center interconnect (DCI) market is driven by the rising demand for high-bandwidth, low-latency connections spurred by edge computing and data-heavy services. The services segment is anticipated to achieve the highest CAGR, catering to complex interconnection infrastructures as organizations shift to hybrid and multi-cloud environments.
